data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Risaralda, Colombia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Risaralda, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 796,188 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Risaralda, Colombia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Risaralda to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 103,139 believers living in Risaralda, Colombia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 103,139 believers in Risaralda, Colombia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Risaralda.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
